nodes.bodyText: If you're merging them, it would be nice to use a LinkedHashSet instead
Why not use the primitive boolean here instead?
If default value is false, we could..
Not sure I like renaming this, it's confusing compared to the original setting
Since default is with example, IMO it makes more sense to say withoutExampleCode when you don't want it.
Then IMHO it's more natural to say something like -DgenerateExample=false
I think my favorite is skipExample :)
I'll go with skipExample using primitives
